title: Enhancing Software Development Competencies: E-Learning Design Strategies Based on Cognitive Characteristics of Older Adults

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific concepts in a three-tier module structure with over 80% accuracy
Learners demonstrate cognitive understanding by passing post-module assessments with over 70% accuracy

Learners will use at least three types of video (YouTube, Inflearn, etc.) and graphic materials (PDF, infographics) in a smartphone environment (Android/iOS) to create a self-directed learning plan of 5 hours per week. They will record it in Google Sheets/Notion and submit a plan that meets at least two of the three checklist items (goal specificity, material suitability, time allocation) provided by the instructor.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
